about.title: What is Bashkent Residence?
about.text1: is not just a residential complex. It is a living environment that combines modern standards of architecture, well-thought-out infrastructure, the aesthetics of urban comfort, and a drive for harmony with the surrounding environment.
about.text2: Inspired by the successful namesake project in Tashkent, the new Bashkent Residence in Bukhara has absorbed the best of the capital’s scale, adapted to the unique historical and cultural context of the ancient city.
about.video-text: Here, space ceases to be just square meters — it becomes an extension of your personality, a reflection of your taste and care for the future.

items.title: AGMK production plants in Almalyk
items.text: On the territory of AGMK in Almalyk, Tashkent region, there are modern production plants that provide a full cycle of processing and product output

items.title: University of Social Innovations, Tashkent
items.text: In Tashkent operates the International University of Social Innovations, which trains a new generation of specialists in the field of social and technological transformations

items.title: Spacious terraces for rest and meetings
items.text: Enjoy panoramic views and fresh air on spacious terraces located right above the commercial spaces — the perfect place for rest, meetings, and pleasant pastime.

items.title: More light. More life.
items.text: Panoramic windows fill your apartment with natural light and create a sense of space. Here, daytime begins with soft sunlight, and evening meets the city lights.

items.title: Style, noticeable at night
items.text: Thought-out facade lighting makes the building stand out at any time of day and creates a cozy atmosphere when you return home.

items.title: Movement starts at the gate
items.text: Well-designed cycle paths connect your home to parks and recreational areas. Conveniently, safely, and ecologically — for those who choose an active lifestyle.

items.title: Always a place to park
items.text: The complex territory provides convenient parking spaces for residents and guests. Safety and accessibility are our top priorities.

infrastructure.title: Next-generation security
infrastructure.text: Modern technologies that will ensure the protection of your home and round-the-clock monitoring of the territory, creating maximum comfort and safety for residents.

page-loader.title: Welcome to Bashkent Residence
texts: Bashkent Residence is your home in the historic center of Bukhara
The complex has a closed courtyard, playground, gym, gymnasium, shops, and cafes

page-loader.title: About the complex
texts: Bashkent Residence is a residential complex in the historic center of Bukhara
1600 apartments in 10–12-story buildings with 2 elevators, a freight elevator, garbage chute, and video surveillance.

page-loader.title: Reliability proven over time
texts: Developer — DUNE GROUP. Since 2019, the company has been implementing large-scale projects in Uzbekistan, combining technical expertise and architectural sense.
The company focuses on sustainable development, safety, technology, and architectural expression.

page-loader.title: Architecture of a new lifestyle
texts: Bashkent Residence is designed as a closed block with full infrastructure.

The complex includes 38 residential buildings built with monolithic technology, enhanced sound insulation, well-thought-out entrances, high-speed passenger and freight elevators, and facade finishing with artificial liquid stone.

page-loader.title: An environment you want to live in
texts: The area of the complex is 103,446 m², almost a third of which is allocated for green zones and recreation areas.

page-loader.title: Apartments that breathe
texts: Each apartment in Bashkent Residence is not just housing, but a personal space where you can live comfortably, relax, raise children, and host guests.

page-loader.title: Infrastructure and amenities
texts: Bashkent Residence is not just a residential complex, but a well-thought-out living environment.

page-loader.title: Contacts and nearby facilities
texts: Bashkent Residence is surrounded by a variety of facilities, such as schools, kindergartens, shopping malls, parks, and cultural institutions.
